snippet: A C-130 transport plane crashed in eastern Afghanistan, killing more than a dozen people, including Afghan civilians, an American military official said.
abstract: More than 12 people die, including civilian contractors, as Air Force C-130J transport plane crashes taking off from Jalalabad, Afghanistan airfield; Pentagon says crash is under investigation.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: A C-130 transport plane crashed in eastern Afghanistan, killing more than a dozen people, including Afghan civilians, an American military official said.

headline.print_headline: Military Plane in Fatal Crash in Afghanistan
headline.main: U.S. Military Plane Crashes in Afghanistan, Killing 14
